title: How to Color Cookie Dough

steps.headline: Spread a medium sized plastic wrap sheet on the counter.
steps.description: Add a small ball of cookie dough in the middle of the sheet.

steps.headline: Make a well or punctured hole with your thumb.
Drop about a drop or two of food coloring in the well.
steps.description: You may also use a small bowl for your food coloring dish. This is an excellent method if you want to experiment with mixing and creating different colors, such as pink or orange.

steps.headline: Wrap the dough and seal well.
Knead the dough until the food coloring has fully incorporated in it.

tyn: Small bowl, to mix colors together
text: Spread a medium sized plastic wrap sheet on the counter. Add a small ball of cookie dough in the middle of the sheet. Make a well or punctured hole with your thumb.  Drop about a drop or two of food coloring in the well. You may also use a small bowl for your food coloring dish. This is an excellent method if you want to experiment with mixing and creating different colors, such as pink or orange. Wrap the dough and seal well.  Knead the dough until the food coloring has fully incorporated in it.  Bake the cookies as directed.
